author: Maria Shriver
title: Maria Shriver on spreading hope from quarantine: 'We all have work to do'
description: "We are all — each and every one of us — a diamond, a crystal, a ray of sunshine in another person’s life."
content:
The full version of this essay originally appeared in Maria Shrivers Sunday Paper newsletter. Subscribe today to receive it in your inbox every week.
